channel.title: Silab connections
channel.description:
please help, i want it so ppl cant connect from silabs, so if they use silabs and login it disconnects them...
or...
it sends a message saying use moparscape client...waits like 5 seconds then disconnects.
please help?
dont be twats like other thread plz...
-- Thanks! --

item.title: Silab connections
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

It should be Thread.sleep(5000) (notice the capital).

Not sure about the UID though.

Read full topic

item.title: Silab connections
item.dc:creator: @Proview Proview
item.description:
@Proview wrote:

ok, i done that, looks good but one thing lol…

client.java:5441: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable UID
location: class client
if(UID == 87304370) {
   ^
client.java:5443: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable thread
location: class client
thread.sleep(5000);
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
2 errors

project cleaned Has been compiled...

Press any key to continue . . .

AN ERROR.

Do i have to create something for my client.java to make thread.sleep work?
All help appreciated.

thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Silab connections
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

Messages on login.

And login from silabs client and it should say the uid on your cmd box.

Read full topic

item.title: Silab connections
item.dc:creator: @Proview Proview
item.description:
@Proview wrote:

Thanks, but what’s the uid of silabs???

Also, do i put that in process…or where the msgs are wen u log in?

– Thanks –

Read full topic

item.title: Silab connections
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

if(UID == whatever it is){
sendMessage("You can't use silabs client");
thread.sleep(5000);
disconnected = true;
}

Read full topic
